FACE_DC
Class FacialFeature

java.lang.Object
  FACE_DC.FacialFeature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ear, Eye, Eyebrow, Face, Mouth, Nose
public class FacialFeature
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a facial feature that is a shape which can be drawn. The shape can be represented by a Polygon or by a Path2D.

Author:
David

Constructs a Facial Feature.

Parameters:

defaultYScale - the default scale factor on the y axis.
defaultX - the default x location of this feature.
defaultY - the default y location of this feature.
